text:
1. Pick up a marker or chalk.
2. Approach the whiteboard or blackboard.
3. Stand in front of the board.
4. Raise the marker or chalk towards the board.
5. Start writing or drawing on the board.
6. Move the marker or chalk across the board to create the desired content.
7. Maintain a steady hand while writing or drawing.
8. Adjust the pressure applied to the marker or chalk to control the thickness of the lines.
9. Continue writing or drawing until the desired information is conveyed.
10. Lower the marker or chalk once finished.
11. Step back from the board to review the content or allow others to see it.
